Streamlit app to display analytics for data science podcasts. See the dashboard [here](https://dspodcasts.streamlit.app/). The dashboard is updated daily based on new transcripts of the podcasts.

```{mermaid}
graph LR
A[Podcast RSS Feeds] --> B[S3 Bucket]
B --> C[Transcription]
C --> D[Named Entity Recognition]
D --> E[Dashboard]
```

Code available on [Github](https://github.com/psimm/podcasts_analysis).

Tech stack:

- Dashboard built and hosted with [Streamlit](https://streamlit.io)
- Visualization with [Plotly](https://plotly.com)
- Data collection using [feedparser](https://github.com/kurtmckee/feedparser)
- Transcription with OpenAI's [Whisper](https://huggingface.co/spaces/openai/whisper) model
- Named entity recognition with [spaCy](https://spacy.io)
- Computation and orchestration with [Modal](https://modal.com)
- Data stored on [AWS S3](https://aws.amazon.com/s3/)
